title: How to Make Easy Microwave, Milk Free Brownies

steps.headline: Locate all your ingredients.
steps.description: Make sure to have them handy.

steps.headline: Sieve both the flour and the cocoa separately, it helps in the smoothness of the mixture.
Melt your butter in your microwave, for about 40 to 50 seconds.
Put into a mixing bowl after melting, and add in this order: sugar, cocoa, vanilla and caramel essence, then mix well.
Add your eggs individually to the mix, making sure to mix very well.
Add the flour, fold it into the mixture a little at a time, making sure it is smooth.
Pour into a (greased or buttered) microwave safe dish after checking the mixture is smooth.
Place your dish into the microwave, on full strength, for about 4 to 5 minutes- depending on the strength of your microwave.
Remove from the microwave, but be careful- it will be hot.
Place on a heat- safe area.
steps.description: Allow to cool for about 2 hours.

steps.headline: Cut into squares after cooling, and enjoy.

text: Locate all your ingredients. Make sure to have them handy. Sieve both the flour and the cocoa separately, it helps in the smoothness of the mixture. This step is optional. Melt your butter in your microwave, for about 40 to 50 seconds.  Put into a mixing bowl after melting, and add in this order: sugar, cocoa, vanilla and caramel essence, then mix well. (preferably after adding each ingredient) Add your eggs individually to the mix, making sure to mix very well.  Add the flour, fold it into the mixture a little at a time, making sure it is smooth.  Pour into a (greased or buttered) microwave safe dish after checking the mixture is smooth.  Place your dish into the microwave, on full strength, for about 4 to 5 minutes- depending on the strength of your microwave.  Remove from the microwave, but be careful- it will be hot.  Place on a heat- safe area. Allow to cool for about 2 hours. Cut into squares after cooling, and enjoy.  Finished.
